name: History
description: The Department of History at Jadavpur University was established in August 1956 as a consequence of the special importance attached to the history of humankind with special reference to Indiaâ€™s past by the National Council of Education. Prof. Nemai Sadhan Bose, Prof. Sushobhan Sarkar, Prof. Jagadish Narayan Sarkar, Prof. Sipra Sarkar, Prof. A.C. Banerjee, Prof. Indrani Ray, Prof. Ratnalekha Ray, Prof. Amalendu De, Prof. Chittabrata Palit, Prof. Himadri Banerjee and other eminent historians taught in this department.
